argument.name: Text
argument.description: Formatted HTML text that corresponds to the original formatted RTF text.

argument.name: data
argument.description: The contents of a RTF memo field.

page.description: Convert from binary to plain text.
page.discussion: The *BIN_TO_HTML() function converts binary RTF text to HTML text. The following images show the RTF text on the form and the converted HTML text in a browser. Limitations: Applies to Alpha Anywhere tables only.

section.title: Example
section.description: This example retrieves the plain text value of a form's commentfield, which is a RTF memo field.
section.example: dim tbl as P dim fld as P dim plain as C tbl = table.current() fld = tbl.field_get("comment") html = *bin_to_plain(fld.value_get() )
